author: cnbc.com
title: Gap Inc. to Report First Quarter 2018 Results on May 24
text:
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Gap Inc. (NYSE: GPS) will report its first quarter 2018 earnings results by press release on May 24, 2018 at 1:15 p.m. Pacific Time.
In addition, the company will host a summary of Gap Inc.â€™s first quarter results during a live conference call and webcast on Thursday, May 24, 2018 from approximately 2:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. Pacific Time. The conference call can be accessed by calling 1-855-5000-GPS or 1-855-500-0477 (participant passcode: 9015811). International callers may dial 1-323-794-2078. The webcast can be accessed at www.gapinc.com .
About Gap Inc.
Gap Inc. is a leading global retailer offering clothing, accessories, and personal care products for men, women, and children under the Old Navy, Gap, Banana Republic, and Athleta brands. Fiscal year 2017 net sales were $15.9 billion. Gap Inc. products are available for purchase in more than 90 countries worldwide through company-operated stores, franchise stores, and e-commerce sites. For more information, please visit www.gapinc.com .
